orcoAddonName.title: Extension name as displayed in "Add-ons and Themes" tab, in the extension catalog, and maybe as combined context menu item, in URL bar for add-on pages. Notice that "short_name" key is mostly ignored, so this one should be short

orcoAddonDescription.message:
A column to mark messages mentioned in Org Mode files.
Requires install of a native messaging helper.
orcoAddonDescription.title: Extension description

browserActionTitle.title: Title for the browser action toolbar button

menuMentions.title: Context menu entry to check mentions and show them in the browser action popup

cmdMentions.title: Command name, an entry in shortcut list (add-on management). Should not contain accelerator key mark.
